allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Update Product Roadmap to v1.2 with consolidated Phase 1

- Merge Phase 1 \(Foundation\) and Phase 2 \(Enhancement\) into single Phase 1 \(Complete Product Launch\)
- Renumber Phase 3 → Phase 2 \(Scale & Monetization\) and Phase 4 → Phase 3 \(Market Leadership\)
- Update all phase references throughout the document for consistency
- Update exit criteria to reflect consolidated 12-week Phase 1 timeline
- Update Metrics Dashboard and Risk Retirement Summary sections
- Update document metadata to version 1.2 and date to January 2026

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Complete Phase 1 Sprint 2 - Monorepo with Graph Processing & Privacy

Frontend \(apps/web\):
- Add 23 React components \(landing, upload, graph, insights, settings\)
- Add Zustand stores \(auth, graph, upload, theme\)
- Add client-side graph algorithms \(Louvain, PageRank, Betweenness\)
- Add platform parsers for 5 platforms \(Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn, Facebook, TikTok\)
- Add web worker for background parsing
- Add API client with auth interceptors

Backend \(apps/api\):
- Add Express server with 5-layer security middleware
- Add authentication \(magic link, JWT\)
- Add privacy services \(HMAC-SHA256 pseudonymization, key management\)
- Add graph ingestion and storage services
- Add insight engine with 30+ templates
- Add Prisma schema with 11 models

Shared \(packages/shared\):
- Add comprehensive TypeScript type definitions
- Add validation and formatting utilities
- Add tier-based limits and constants

Infrastructure:
- Set up pnpm monorepo with workspaces
- Remove old mockup directories \(reorganized to mockups/\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
